attributes.action: Take action/joint action with the UN in response to the genicide in Burma.
attributes.background: The Rohingyan people are being ethnically cleansed, raped and slaughtered in masses. The Burmese government are not allowing the UN or charities in to help. Furthermore, no country or the UN has taken action to stop the violence of a genocide. We ask the UK to help the Rohingyan people from genocide
